p: Measurement of viral load in tissues from euthanized A129 mice indicated that both mock control and ChAdOx1-EDIII vaccinated mice had similar high brain viral loads detectable at day 8 ( Figure 5e, Brain). Similar findings were obtained by in-situ hybridization (ISH) in brain tissue ( Figure 5f), with the presence of ZIKV in both groups but a trend towards lower levels in the ChAdOx1-EDIII group.
